name: Each Attempt
description: Each attempt removes a certain number of dangerous objects

remove-count.name: Number of objects to be removed
remove-count.description: How many objects will be deleted per death.

removal-radius.name: Removal radius (in blocks)
removal-radius.description: Objects are only removed within this radius from the death location. 0 = infinite radius.

custom-ids.name: Additional object IDs
custom-ids.description: List the IDs of other objects to be deleted, separated by commas (e.g. 1,2,3).
